mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_INTFACE_TRANS_LOG${tableNum} (interface_primary_key, settle_date, org_interface_primary_key, dms_related_key, org_dms_related_key, trans_id, trans_st, ins_code, mchnt_code, shop_code, resp_code, pri_acct_no, card_no, user_inf_user_name, product_code, trans_amt, upload_amt, trans_curr_cd, trans_chnl, trans_fee, trans_fee_type, tfr_in_acct_no, tfr_out_acct_no, additional_info, term_code, remarks, create_user, update_user, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{interfacePrimaryKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settleDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgInterfacePrimaryKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmsRelatedKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgDmsRelatedKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transSt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{insCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mchntCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{respCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priAcctNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userInfUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transCurrCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transChnl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transFeeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tfrInAcctNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tfrOutAccNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{additionalInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{termCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '99999999', '99999999', sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ( SELECT
FROM TB_INTFACE_TRANS_LOG${tableNum} WHERE DMS_RELATED_KEY=#{relatedKey} ORDER BY INTERFACE_PRIMARY_KEY ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT
FROM ( SELECT
FROM TB_TRANS_LOG${tableNum} WHERE DMS_RELATED_KEY=#{relatedKey} ORDER BY TXN_PRIMARY_KEY ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT
FROM ( SELECT
FROM TB_ACCOUNT_LOG${tableNum} WHERE TXN_PRIMARY_KEY=#{relatedKey} ORDER BY ACT_PRIMARY_KEY ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM=1
SELECT FROM TB_INTFACE_TRANS_LOG_HIS WHERE ORG_DMS_RELATED_KEY=#{orgDmsRelatedKey} AND ROWNUM=1

SELECT
FROM TB_INTFACE_TRANS_LOG_HIS WHERE DMS_RELATED_KEY=#{dmsRelatedKey} AND ROWNUM=1
